### Project Delivery Services
#### Solicitation Details
* **Solicitation Number**: 22-58043
* **Publication Date**: 2022-10-31
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-11-28T14:00:00 (expired)
* **Region**: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada
#### Tender Overview
The Knowledge Information and Technology Services (KITS) Branch at National Research Council Canada invites proposals for the provision of project delivery services, specifically:
* Level 3 Technical Writer
* IT Security Design Specialist
* Project Coordinator
* Project Manager

These services are required on an "as and when needed" basis to support the execution of IM/IT related projects. The selected contractor shall deliver services to the National Research Council Canada, and the terms and conditions of the contract will be governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

#### Key Procurement Information
* **Contracting Entity**: National Research Council Canada
* **Contact Information**: Roxanne Azzi Abboud, roxanne.azziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca, (613) 299-9650
* **Notice URL**: None
* **Attachments**: 
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/6a080703c6ffcb4343272879d534a6c0/22-58043_npp_amendment_project_delivery_services.pdf
	+ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/31/a91f9b3af18ab84d74666b0ec340d869/22-58043_npp_project_delivery_services.pdf> Project Delivery Services <## `Project Delivery Services`
